videos.title: Marys Mayhem 2 day Gravel event near Mudgee
videos.description: A two day Gravel ride around Mudgee organised by Graveleur. We did the 100km each day and had a blast. It was great to have the gang back together - it's always the best! Thanks Liana, Amanda, Tom, Dave, Leanne and Kim! Let's get another in the calendar soon!

videos.title: Maxxis tyres rolls into Marys Mayhem gravel race hosted by Graveleur
videos.description:
Maxxis rolled into the heart of New South Wales wine country for the highly anticipated Marys Mayhem gravel race, part of the fast-growing Graveleur Series in Mudgee. With a full event setup that put the brand front and centre, Maxxis made its presence felt at one of Australia's favourite gravel events.

The race drew an enthusiastic crowd of over 300 riders, all keen to explore the scenic backroads of Mudgee. From the moment the ride kicked off under the iconic Maxxis arch to the final rider crossing the line. Maxxis was part of the experience, flags flying, tyres turning, and good vibes all around.

We're stoked to have been part of such an incredible weekend in Mudgee for Marys Mayhem and extend a big thank you to the Graveleur team for hosting another top-tier event. 
As the gravel scene continues to grow, Maxxis is proud to roll with it. one ride at a time.

#Wearemaxxis #Maxxisbikeau #Maxxistyres #Maxxisgravel

videos.title: 10-08-24 Day 1 Marys Mayhem Graveleur Series Mudgee
10-08-24 Day 1 Marys Mayhem Graveleur Series Mudgee
The best Australian gravel event of the year?
videos.description:
Mary's Mayhem might just be the most underrated gravel event on the Australian event calendar. Open a beer, get into the spirit of gravel and come for a two day ride with us and check out the event.

The route: 
https://www.strava.com/activities/12108609394
https://www.strava.com/activities/12116170905

Socials:
https://www.instagram.com/bryce.waters/

Graveleur:
https://graveleur.cc/

Par Küp CC:
https://www.parkup.cc/
